channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: X now lets you query Grok by mentioning it in replies
item.description: X is actively working to expand the reach of xAI’s Grok model to more users on the platform. Multiple users noted today that people can now mention Gr...

item.title: SpaceX Starship spirals out of control in second straight test flight failure
item.description: SpaceX’s Starship spiraled out of control while in space during a test flight Thursday, marking the second launch in a row that the vehicle has run in...

item.title: AI Thinks It Cracked Kryptos. The Artist Behind It Says No Chance
item.description: Jim Sanborn’s inbox is flooded with amateur cryptographers who say they’ve cracked the code with chatbots like Grok 3.

item.title: FBI says scammers are targeting US executives with fake BianLian ransom notes
item.description: The FBI is warning that scammers are impersonating the BianLian ransomware gang using fake ransom notes sent to U.S. corporate executives. The fake ra...

item.title: Last day to apply to be a TechCrunch Sessions: AI speaker
item.description: TechCrunch Sessions: AI kicks off on June 5 in Zellerbach Hall at UC Berkeley — and we want AI leaders to take part in industry-changing conversations...

item.title: Meta’s next Llama models may have upgraded voice features
item.description: Meta’s next major “open” AI model may have a voice focus, per a report in Financial Times. According to the piece, Meta is planning to introduce impro...

item.title: A Brand New Botnet Is Delivering Record-Size DDoS Attacks
item.description: Eleven11bot infects webcams and video recorders, with a large concentration in the US.

item.title: Is It Electric or Magnetic? Depends on Where You Stand
item.description: Physics is weird. Especially when you’re dealing with moving reference frames.

item.title: T3 Aire IQ Review: A Great Hair Dryer, in Theory
item.description: This efficient, smart hair dryer would feel more intelligent if it got the basics right.

item.title: AOC Q27G4ZD QD-OLED Gaming Monitor Review: Bright and Shiny
item.description: No matter whether you’re streaming movies or playing Overwatch, AOC’s QD-OLED gaming monitor shines.
